thread.title: Demonstrators protest Stephon Clark shooting for second night

title: Demonstrators protest Stephon Clark shooting for second night
text:
Demonstrators protest Stephon Clark shooting for second night 12:24pm GMT - 01:00 
Protesters clashed with police in Sacramento Friday night after the shooting of Stephon Clark, an unarmed black man shot by police 20 times. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
